snippet: A $10 billion settlement on foreclosure abuse claims is expected to be announced as early as Monday. | Banks are given more time to meet global regulations designed to prevent financial crises. | Even with new financial rules, challenges remain in...
abstract: A $10 billion settlement on foreclosure abuse claims is expected to be announced as early as Monday. | Banks are given more time to meet global regulations designed to prevent financial crises. | Even with new financial rules, challenges remain in policing fraud. | A former chairman of Citigroup is trying to revive a jazz club in Harlem.

headline.main: Foreclosure Settlement Said to Be Imminent
